LanguageData.RocketEngine.label: Rocket Engine
LanguageData.ReactorComponents.label: Reactor Components
LanguageData.ReactorComponents.description: Special hardened and shielded components for use in reactors.
LanguageData.turbineBlade.label: Turbine Blades
LanguageData.UraniumPellets.label: Uranium Pellets
LanguageData.UraniumPellets.description: Pellets of uranium used in the construction of nuclear fuel rods.
LanguageData.Plutonium.label: plutonium
LanguageData.Plutonium.description: A case of plutonium, can be used to create nuclear weapons or nuclear fuel rods.
LanguageData.DepletedUraniumPellets.label: Depleted Uranium
LanguageData.DepletedUraniumPellets.description: Pellets of depleted uranium used in the construction of nuclear fuel rods.
LanguageData.FissionWarhead.label: Nuclear Warhead (Fission)
LanguageData.FissionWarhead.description: An explosive device that derives its destructive force from nuclear reactions, this design uses fission and generates a smaller explosion.
LanguageData.RailgunSabot.label: Railgun Sabot
LanguageData.RailgunSabot.description: A kinetic energy projectile fired from a railgun.
LanguageData.FuelRods.label: fuel rods
LanguageData.FuelRods.description: A group of rods filled with uranium pellets, when loaded in a reactor core they generate heat which can be used to drive a turbine.
LanguageData.FuelRodsMOX.label: fuel rods MOX
LanguageData.FuelRodsMOX.description: A group of rods filled with a mix of uranium and plutonium, when loaded in a reactor core they generate heat which can be used to drive a turbine.
LanguageData.ChunkRadioactiveSlag.label: radioactive slag chunk
LanguageData.NuclearWaste.label: Nuclear Waste
LanguageData.ThrownSlag.label: ThrownSlag
